ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: the fault-finder who goes around slandering,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The excessively insulting one, spreader of spite.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A Hammaz, going about with Namim,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: or to any defamer or one who spreads slander,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: A defamer, spreader abroad of slander.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: A slanderer, going about with calumnies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: A slanderer, going about with calumnies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: the backbiter who goes about slandering,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [And] scorner, going about with malicious gossip -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:11] backbiting, faultfinder, that is to say, calumniator, scandal-monger, spreading [evil] talk among people in order to sow dissension between them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Detractor) who slanders and curses people right and left, (spreader abroad of slanders) who is a talebearer in order to cause mischief between people?
